captions.text: I’m not! I just went on an epic adventure, killing zombies and riding unicorns!
Sure you did just like every “adventure” you go on...
(Chrisi) DAN!! THE MILKS TRYING TO ESCAPE AGAIN!
MARTY!! WE HAVE TO GO BACK!
Roads!? Where we’re going we don’t need roads!
You have white hair, I should trust you!
COOOL! FLASHY BUTTONS! I WANT A RED ONE, A BLUE ONE, AND ANOTHER RED ONE
Marty! What are you doing!? You could send us-
I REMEMBER THIS! THERE’S A SNOW NINJA HERE!
A ninja can only be seen?
MARTY, YOU CAN’T BRING YOUR PAST SELF WITH US! YOU COULD HAVE ALREADY ENDANGERED THE TIMELINE, WHICH COULD RESULT IN A CATASTROPHIC-
OH MY GOD I WAS JUST THINKING THAT!!
You’re in a time machine and you want waffles!?
STOP! WE COULD END UP IN-

+The Walking Dead Fan HOW??

Someone did a respectful prayer and he blurts in his opinion... It's fine 
he doesn't believe in God, I didn't ask him to. However, there was no need 
to state his opinion at all. You don't see me going into gay bars and 
preaching that they are all going to hell... That is EXACTLY what he did...
